# Growth curves

Using the von Bertalanffy equation, where:
Linf: theoretical maximum length
K: growth coefficient
t0: theoretical age at zero length

```{r}
#| label: von Bertalanffy growth curve

age <- 1
TLage1 <- 607.7*(1-exp(-0.17*(age + 1.88)))
TLage1
```
